data.text: Whenever in Rhodes Town we always stay at 10GR. The hotel is situated right in the heart of the Old Town and close to everything. The rooms are fantastic and I would recommend the Stone Rooms as they have a lovely seating area outside. The food is fantastic and obviously the wine is of the highest quality. Even if you chose not to stay at 10GR it is a worth a visit for drinks and dinner. I certainly will be back again as will many of our clients
data.title: Best Boutique Hotel In Rhodes

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear UKTradewinds, 
Thank you for the time spent to leave us such an amazing feedback .It was a pleasure to have you here with us and we are looking forward to welcome you again on your next visit in Rhodes . We trully apreciate your kind words.
Kind regards 
10Gr Boutique Hotel & Wine Bar Team
owner_response.author: Irene  Peppa

data.text: We arrived near midnight to this great hotel right in the heart of old town Rhodes. We were welcomed by a staff member (who turned out to be the bartender).  This hotel is built into the old walls of this medieval city but has all the modern amenities that you will need.  The service was great, staff friendly and helpful, rooms were clean and our rooms were spacious (I stayed in the Junior Suite).  Rates were very reasonable (we were there in the offseason) which included breakfast and 10% off dinner.   We ate there two nights and the meals were great.  You won't go wrong with this hotel.
data.title: 10GR Boutique Hotel In Rhodes HIghly Recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Lsaris, We are thrilled to know  that you enjoyed your experience at 10GR Boutique Hotel & Wine Bar . It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. We are very grateful about your review among us, we work in the hospitality business to bring you sweet experiences and memories! It's fantastic our team could accommodate your needs and assist you in any way possible. We aim to please and your praise lets us know we're doing our job! We hope your next stay with us will be as pleasant as this one! Kind regards
owner_response.author: Irene  Peppa

data.text: Unique design and decor. Staff very friendly and helpful, food and drink great. Very comfortable rooms. Ideally placed to view the old city and it's environment within walking distance from most of the City's historic sites, port and beach.
data.title: Great experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,
Thank you for your positive feedback!
We are delighted that you fully enjoyed the room's facilities and our services..
Your nice words are very much appreciated .
It was apleasure to have you here with us and we are looking forward to welcome you again on your next visit in sunny Rhodes , 
Best regards
owner_response.author: Irene  Peppa

data.text:
The 10GR was a wonderful experience. From the pick up, at the gate, in their golf buggy, to check in, the breakfasts, and the lovely Greek gin night caps. 
The staff are absolutely brilliant. So friendly and helpful. 
The standard rooms are small, but perfect, with really comfortable beds and a cute seating area outside. You can request have your breakfast there, but I loved sitting outside on the cobbled street, soaking up the atmosphere of the old town, to have mine. 
The location was perfect in the the heart of everything, but peaceful at night. 
It was our first visit to Rhodes, and we were in the old town for 3 nights. Unfortunately we didnâ€™t have time to eat an evening meal, or try their wine tasting, as there is so much to see and do. 
I did however see a big group wine tasting whilst there, and it looked so much fun. 
We will definitely be back to Rhodes, and the 10GR, so look forward to trying both then.
data.title: Flawless, a great find.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear chilled-out-travel, It was a pleasure having you here with us and I would like to express our deep thanks for taking the time to share your experience at 10gr Boutique Hotel & Wine Bar. Therefore, we are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and stayed satisfied with our services facilities, location and staff .Hope to welcome you again in the future. Kind regards,
owner_response.author: Irene  Peppa

data.text: This hotel is beautiful, I would definitely return to this hotel , we stayed in the lidos suite, the Jacuzzi in the room was fantastic, and with twin showers, breakfast, we had the Greek breakfast and that was really nice.
data.title: Right in the heart of old Town, the wonderful find
